name: StarWord Puzzle brain word up free game starwords
name_original: StarWord Puzzle brain word up free game starwords
description:
StarWord is a simple, yet super fun game that becomes more challenging with each level. With hundreds of levels to master, each level is unique in its own sense, where a player has to find out one or several specific words on a board of scrambled letters. In other words, it offers a rich, engrossing single player experience to those who want to sharpen up their word skills.

It’s like a new version of scrabble with very intriguing and puzzling twist to it. The rules are very easy, and you just need to slide your finger on the tiles until you find the hidden words. The excitement and traits will build up as you progress the game

So is your brain is up for hunting some hidden words?

Specifically, some of the key features of StarWord are:

• 500 gripping levels

• Unique game for every player (One cannot simply Google the answer)

• Winning Eye Candy

• Multi languages support

• Addictive game play that provides endless hours of fun

• Hidden Bonus Levels

Although, the game offers players some familiar strategic elements from classic word games, still it has certain innovative new features and twists, which other games fail to offer. Suitable for all ages, the game has a broad appeal and is destined to become one of the world’s most downloadable mobile games.
